methods: String coerceToHtmlText(Context context) Turn this item into HTML text, regardless of the type of data it actually contains.
CharSequence coerceToStyledText(Context context) Like coerceToHtmlText(Context), but any text that would be returned as HTML formatting will be returned as text with style spans.
CharSequence coerceToText(Context context) Turn this item into text, regardless of the type of data it actually contains.
